tag_list: layak, profile, fullerene, business, agra, india, edudigm, vimal, enterprenuer, iit, kharagpur, kolkata, technology, it, education
overview:
As Fullerene Solution’s Co-Founder, Layak brings the best inventiveness to the company, with a flair of creativity and problem solving. He is a B.Tech graduate, Mechanical Engineering from IIT Kharagpur. He has an ample amount of professional experience.

His work at startups helped him gain business management and leadership qualities. He has been a mentor to so many students all over the nation through web platforms and physically also supporting them in deciding their career paths and helping them in their problems. He was also the backbone in the building up of the IIT Kharagpur chapter of SAE. He has also co-authored the book Concept-Maps, the first of its kind in India to help students emphasize on key concepts in IIT-JEE.

He has done his industrial internships at Indian Oil Corporation Ltd. (IOCL) and Defense Research and Development Organization, India (DRDO). His immense experience at supporting various individuals and organizations in relations to project management and problem solving canâ€™t be documented!

He has also held many Positions of Responsibility as Coordinator of various events like Kshitij, the largest techno-management fest of India, SAE India, and at Lemon Fresh Solutions Pvt. Ltd. He has also been involved in various extra-curricular activities at IIT Kharagpur.

He has a professional career history of achieving employment goals. He believes in achieving success through hard work.
